author: Brianna Ehley
title: Trump downplays risk of coronavirus rebound
description: Top health officials said they all expect a return of the virus in the fall
content: Trumps comments come one day after CDC Director Robert Redfield warned in a Washington Post interview that a second wave of the coronavirus in the fall could be even more difficult than the current outbreak if it coincides with flu season. The CDC director's … [+1579 chars]
